pages.text: How to create playlists and add music using the $(l:iammusicplayer:item_or_block_with_feature/music_manager)Music Manager$(/l).

pages.title: Create playlist
pages.text: First, if you don't have a playlist, create one.$(br)Please specify the name, public settings, and initial authority.

pages.title: Join an existing playlist
pages.text: If you want to add playlists created by other players, please select from the list of playlists that you can participate in.

pages.title: Add music to playlists
pages.text: Select the playlist to which you want to add music and add music from [Add music].$(br)Playlists created by other players cannot add music unless the authority is a member or higher.

pages.title: Music add completed
pages.text: If the playlist screen that opens first has the music you just added, the music addition is complete.
